Edith Pikwa Boma (amụrụ na abalị atọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị ) bụ onye ome ihe nkiri Cameroon, onye bi na Houston, Texas, USA

A họpụtara ya dika onye na-eme ihe nkiri ' kacha mma/na ome ihe nkiri nwere ebimnoni -ihe nrite nke ụmụ amaala ndị nọ ná mba maka ihe nkiri akpọrọ , A Message to Brian, nke  gosiputara ya, na 2014 Golden Icons Academy Movie Awards (GIAMA) Awards
Emere ihe nkiri a na Houston, Texas
Akpọrọ ya na fim aha ya bụ, Ndolor na Senator, nke malitere n'abalị iri atọ na otu nke ọnwa Jenụwarị, afọ 2016 na Houston, Texas

Ihe nkiri nke Mbango Adambi mepụtara ma  Gordon Che duziri ma ndị Callywood na Nollywood na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Mbango Adambi, Kelechi Eke, Frank Artus, Sunnyfield Okezie, Jasmine Roland, Eko Leonel, Ruth Taku, Bareh Mildred, Samson Tarh na Beatrice Nwana
Ihe nkiri ya, Kiss of Death, bụ ihe nkiri mmeghe na mmemme CAMIFF 2017 na Eprel 24
Ọ bụ onye na-eduzi ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri Camerwood 2018, bụ Tenacity, na-egosikwa Libota McDonald, Mat Atugon, Vuga Samson na Eyo Eyo Michael
Ihe nkiri a nwetakwara ihe nrite ihe nkiri kacha mma na 2018 CAMIFF Awards
